trashQueens.name: Trash Queens
trashQueens.description:
Role: front-end web developer 
 
 Trash Queens is a recycling game for all ages to learn about how to recycle properly. It offers a fast-paced and dynamic gameplay for users, as well as information as to the importance of recycling.  
 
 Explore the app, expand your knowledge and make the world a better place!

journry.name: Journry
journry.description:
Role: full-stack web developer 
 
 Journry is a note-taking app that allows users to keep track of their daily tasks, important events, and personal thoughts. 
 
 This app was created as part of a technical project to help us gain experience with new tools and technologies. During the development of the app, we utilized various programming languages, libraries, and frameworks.

adoBot.name: Ado Bot Communities
adoBot.description:
Role: full-stack web developer 
 
 In this project, I designed and built a social media application that closely resembles Reddit. Users can create communities and share posts within those communities. To promote a positive and healthy online environment, I integrated a robust AI model that accurately detects and flags toxic content. 
 
 The application's interface allows for real-time user engagement, and it offers standard functionalities for managing communities and posts. In addition to the aforementioned features, I added a 3D bot model to the application, serving as a friendly companion to users. 
 
 The bot animates, creating an immersive and enjoyable experience that encourages users to engage with the platform and its communities.

loveIsWar.name: Love is War
loveIsWar.description:
Role: front-end web developer 
 
 Working in a team of developers and designers, we created a dynamic and engaging multiplayer trivia game. The game features an intuitive user interface with a real-time leaderboard that updates dynamically as players compete against each other. 
 
 Throughout the development process, we followed the agile methodology, which enabled us to make consistent progress and deliver successful weekly updates. We meticulously organized and revamped the game's structure and core to ensure a seamless and enjoyable gameplay experience. 
 
 In the end, the final product is a captivating and challenging game that players of all ages and backgrounds can enjoy. With its sleek design, intuitive controls, and thrilling gameplay, the multiplayer trivia game offers endless hours of entertainment and fun.

pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
pathfinder.description:
Role: full-stack web developer 
 
 Pathfinder is a study helper that reformats educational resources such as assignment guidelines and instructions to help students with learning hurdles understand the content easily. 
 
 Pathfinder offers multitude of tools such as customization of your uploaded documents (colours, font styles, etc.), a built-in dictionary, text summarization, and highlight feature.

innota.name: Innota Tech
innota.description:
Role: full-stack web developer 
 
 Production password: 'InnotaIsAwesome2023' 
 
 Working with a startup client, Innota is a web application designed for academic researchers and students who collaborate on research projects. 
 
 It offers a Figma-like interface to upload PDF documents and research papers, making it easy for users to connect and build relationships between their notes and highlights. 
 
 Innota also allows users to annotate their documents with personalized comments and thoughts, providing a streamlined and efficient tool for collaborative research.
